owun rohalgatha kirimata pera dina gathakala rathri samaja shalawe si.si.ti.wi. darshana da parikshana sadaha labagena athi athara, owunge siruru gnyathinta bharadima sambandhayen thinduwa ada (17) prakashayata pathkarana bawa kotuwa mahesthrath adhikaranaya eeye (16) danum dunna.
ese kala nam eeniya winishchaya mandalayata thama seluwa wasa gannata yanthamin ho hakiyawak thibuni.
(7) gothami suthraya
ee wagema duwage siya matin pathirana mahathata pin pinisath duwage amma thaththa wisin wisheshayen me pinkama sudu keruna.
ee nisama palathe jana­tha­wata karya­kshama sewa­wak laba­denna pulu­wan.
